snippet: A civil defense official says that about 10 million gallons of mining acid leaked into a river that supplies water to tens of thousands of people.
abstract: Civil defense official in Mexico says 10 million gallons of mining acid leaked into river that supplies water to tens of thousands of people; Grupo Mexico, operator of mine, has yet to respond.
lead_paragraph: A civil defense official says that about 10 million gallons of mining acid leaked into a river that supplies water to tens of thousands of people.
